Docs.summary: Provides stateless methods for decoding .NET Remoting Binary Format (NRBF) encoded data.

Docs.param: The stream to inspect. The stream must be both readable and seekable.
Docs.summary: Checks if given stream starts with NRBF payload header.
Docs.returns: if it starts with NRBF payload header; otherwise, .

remarks.para: When this method returns, will be restored to its original position.

Docs.exception: The stream does not support reading or seeking.
